data.oai_dc:dc: Pairwise genetic distances at locus RUB126 between the 579 samples analyzed. These distances were calculated using the meandistance.matrix function in the R package "polysat" version 0.1, using the Bruvo.distance measure. Each file contains a square matrix with row names and column names (sample names), as produced by the write.csv function in R version 2.11 under default parameters.
